item.title: It's Not Just TikTok: These Other ByteDance Apps Are Gone Too
item.description: Lemon8, CapCut, and Gauth are among the other victims of the US ban on ByteDance-owned apps.

item.title: How to Get Around the US TikTok Ban
item.description: TikTok is now unavailable in the United States—and getting around the ban isn't as simple as using a VPN. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: TikTok Is Unavailable in the US—and Gone From the App Stores
item.description: After President Biden declined to reassure Apple, Google, and Oracle that they wouldn’t be fined for giving Americans access to TikTok, the app’s hope...

item.title: TikTok goes dark in the US
item.description: TikTok has gone dark in the U.S., the result of a federal law that bans the popular short-form video app for millions of Americans — at least for now....

item.title: Perplexity AI submits bid to merge with TikTok
item.description: With a TikTok ban looming in the United States, Perplexity AI is the latest bidder hoping to give the video app a new corporate home. CNBC first repor...
